title: X-Men 2
description:
This is from the original scanner. I adjusted the resolution and compressed the file for easier reading on tablets and ereaders. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


X-Men 2

By:   	Brian Wood, Olivier Coipel	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Series:   	X-Men
Publisher:   	Marvel Comics	
Pub. Date:  	June 26, 2013
Format:         CBZ

The school is on lockdown. . . but if the bad guys can't get out, neither can the X-Men!

John Sublime is back, but is one of the X-Men's scariest villains not who we should be afraid of?

Who or what is Arkea?
